channel.title: How do i get onto other peoples servers?
channel.description:
yeah im new...im gonna get called a noob
but i see all these people advertising about their server. And it looks like an awesome thing
but i type in their ip address into my moparscape window and the port
what else do i do? cause i cant get it to work?
please can somebody give me directions on how to get this to work?
sincerley -syn :cool:

item.title: How do i get onto other peoples servers?
item.dc:creator: @synyster_a7x synyster_a7x
item.description:
@synyster_a7x wrote:

thanks buddy!

this is so awesome

its like something looked down on me from heaven and smiled

Read full topic
item.source: How do i get onto other peoples servers?

item.title: How do i get onto other peoples servers?
item.dc:creator: @homieg homieg
item.description:
@homieg wrote:

ok,here we go,first,look at the server name.type it in on your ip adress.
step2.if it doesnt work maybe its your port?to access your port go to the top right of your moparscape screen and click new file,once u click it select new port.look on the server advertisement u want and type in that port.
step3.if it still doesnt work that means u might need hamachi.what is hamchi you say?it lets you connect to other networks.u can download it from rar.cc.\

well thats it,have fun on moparscape!

Read full topic
item.source: How do i get onto other peoples servers?

item.description:
@kirill113 wrote:

dont be that way when i was a starter i tryed atleast 12 servers but il tell u 1 thing go in server status and go down undil end and pick a server from there try

item.title: How do i get onto other peoples servers?
item.dc:creator: @synyster_a7x synyster_a7x
item.description:
@synyster_a7x wrote:

yeah i thought of that

but i tried it with at least 5 servers

is it me? or what

maybe i did something wrong…

what i did is put in the port and the ip adress
do i have to register a username? or does it matter

ill keep trying with other servers…but still can someone give me like step by step instructions on how to do this? please :o

i feel nooby
